channel.title: Clicking Tab Prices
channel.description:
Okay in the server i develop at the momment you have by pvp tab you can click on different images and when you click on it you'll getting the armor like "void" or "bandos" but i want if you click on the button (images), the players lose some money so it's not free armor etc.
Thanks.

item.title: Clicking Tab Prices
item.dc:creator: @TheDeveloper TheDeveloper
item.description:
@TheDeveloper wrote:

umm i only want if they click on the button they close money, like an shop, but thanks for helping.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Tab Prices
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Create the buttons using an interface editor (maybe lins) then attach action button click events to each one and parse the input from your server.

Read full topic
